name: Tagliata With Radicchio And Parmesan
recipeIngredient: 3 pounds sirloin or other cut of steak, 1 1/2 to 2 inches thick, at room temperature
1 ounce Parmesan cheese, shaved with a vegetable peeler

recipeInstructions.text: Grill, sauté or broil steak to taste. Allow to rest on a carving board for 10 minutes. Slice thinly, diagonally against the grain, and arrange on a large warmed plate.
Pour pan juices over meat, and cover with shredded radicchio. Top with shredded Parmesan, and serve.
